name: Thurgood Marshall Academic High School
description: Serves: High School (9-13) Thurgood Marshall Academic High School (TMAHS) is a four-year, college-preparatory public school in southeast San Francisco with a diverse student body. It operates on an eight-period day, offering core and elective courses—including AP options—that fulfill UC and CSU requirements. Students have access to a refurbished College & Career Center, a fully staffed Wellness Center, a Peer Resources Program, and a broad array of extracurricular activities. TMAHS emphasizes a
